title: naadhOpaasanache
sahitya:
nAdOpAsanace shankaranArAyaNa vidhulu vElasiri O manasA



anupallavi



 vEdOddharalu vEdAtItulu vishvamella niNDi yuNDE vAralu



caraNam



 mantramulu yantra yantramulu mari manvantramu lennO galavAralu 

tantri laya svara rAga vilOlulu tyAgarAja vandyulu svatantrulu
